attributes.action: Recognise and reward the immense achievement of Major Phil Packer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Major Phil Packer has today completed the London Marathon after 13 days of intense and gruelling effort, and in the process raised £1 million for "Help For Heroes"

This from a man who was so severely injured serving his country - You and I - that he was told he would never walk again, and who has 'catastrophic injuries'

Major Packer: We salute you

Prime Minister Brown: We are spending billions to give citizens of other countries Hope We are spending tens of billions supporting industry in these difficult times. Nothing less than a pound for pound match for the monies raised by Major Packer is tolerable. A tenfold, or even hundredfold, contribution would be much more fitting

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
